Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. relproducts.title: Pure Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

relproducts.title: Polar Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: An off-white shade, thepolar white25mm perfect fit blindis the perfect addition to any living space. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.
